about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
On a long mossy fallen tree near a creek running down a mountain is where you will find yourself beginning this experience. Next, take a seat next to vibrant blooming flowers at a botanical garden. At the end of this immersion enjoy the sunset over the ocean waves as you find yourself enjoying an island on the ocean all to yourself.

Purpose
Relaxation
Mindfulness
Self meditation

Length
10:07

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

name: Exhale XR - Good Day Vibes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
